titleStmt.title: L.F. Lord Keeper his speech before the Kings Majesty and both Houses in the high court of Parliament. Concerning His Majesties reigne with the bishops, iudges, & peeres of the land. With the Kings Majesties speech, or charge to the speaker.
titleStmt.author: Finch of Fordwich, John Finch, Baron, 1584-1660.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by Richard Cotton,

notesStmt.note: "His Majesties speech", on the final leaf, is identified as Thomason E.199[44].
Reproductiond of the original in the British Library.
